Text: Thank you very much for Your releases! Can you add the genre please?
Someone needs to create a torrent for "k.d. lang Live in Sydney."  This 1998 DVD is impossible to find and is no longer available.  They want over 100 Pounds for a VHS tape at Amazon UK!

Duh!  After much research and a complicated transoceanic mix-up with a video store in Australia, I discovered this concert was never released on DVD (only VHS and laserdisc)!  I wound up paying $50 to have a professional rip done from my VHS copy and now have a great quality DVD of it.

I'd happily upload it here but I am a computer idiot and need to be talked through the steps of how to upload.  Any one want to help?
